Class AddImportantDayFrame

java.lang.Object
cmpt213.assignment.importantdaystracker.view.AddImportantDayFrame
public class AddImportantDayFrame extends Object
This class represents a frame for adding new important days. It provides a GUI interface with input fields for the name, description, date, and type-specific information (location for Anniversary, person name for Birthday, or frequency for Occasion). The frame includes a combo box for selecting the type of important day and a date picker for selecting the date.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddImportantDayFrame

      public AddImportantDayFrame()
      Constructor for AddImportantDayFrame class. Creates a new frame for adding important days with a title and basic layout.

  • Method Details

    • showFrame

      public void showFrame()
      Shows the frame by setting its visibility to true. Makes the frame visible to the user after all components have been added.

    • createType

      public void createType()
      Creates the type selection panel with a combo box for selecting the type of important day. The combo box contains three options: Anniversary, Birthday, and Occasion. When a type is selected, it triggers an update to the name field.

    • createName

      public void createName()
      Creates the name input panel with a text field for entering the name of the important day. The panel contains a label "Name:" and a text field limited to 200x25 pixels. Adds rigid areas for spacing and adds the panel to the main panel.

    • createDate

      public void createDate()
      Creates the date input panel with a date picker component. The panel contains a label "Date:" and a date picker limited to 200x25 pixels. Uses DatePickerSettings to set the date format to "yyyy-MM-dd". Adds rigid areas for spacing and adds the panel to the main panel.

    • createDescription

      public void createDescription()
      Creates the description input panel with a text field for entering the description. The panel contains a label "Description:" and a text field limited to 200x25 pixels. Adds rigid areas for spacing and adds the panel to the main panel.

    • createSpecific

      public void createSpecific()
      Creates the specific input panel with a text field for entering specific information. The panel contains a label that changes based on the selected type (Location/Person name/Frequency) and a text field limited to 200x25 pixels. Adds rigid areas for spacing and adds the panel to the main panel.

    • updateNameField

      public void updateNameField()
      Updates the specific label text based on the currently selected type in the type combo box. Changes to "Person name:" for Birthday type, "Location:" for Anniversary type, and "Frequency:" for Occasion type.

    • createTwoButtons

      public void createTwoButtons()
      Creates a panel with two buttons: Create and Cancel. The Create button validates input and creates a new important day. The Cancel button closes the frame without saving.
